00015 #ifndef userdmmH
00016 #define userdmmH
00017 
00018 #include "chardevicedriver.h"
00019 #include "charinterface.h"
00020 #include "dmm.h"
00021 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 //! Base class for SCPI DMMs.
00023 class XDMMSCPI : public XCharDeviceDriver<XDMM>
00024 {
00025     XNODE_OBJECT
00026 protected:
00027     XDMMSCPI(const char *name, bool runtime,
00028              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00029              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00030              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00031              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00032         XCharDeviceDriver<XDMM>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers) {}
00033 public:
00034     virtual ~XDMMSCPI() {}
00035 
00036     //! requests the latest reading
00037     virtual double fetch();
00038     //! one-shot reading
00039     virtual double oneShotRead();
00040 protected:
00041     //! called when m_function is changed
00042     virtual void changeFunction();
00043 };
00044 
00045 
00046 //! Keithley 2182 nanovolt meter
00047 //! You must setup 2182 for SCPI mode
00048 class XKE2182:public XDMMSCPI
00049 {
00050     XNODE_OBJECT
00051 protected:
00052     XKE2182(const char *name, bool runtime,
00053             const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00054             const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00055             const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00056             const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00057         XDMMSCPI(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00058     {
00059         function()->add("VOLT");
00060         function()->add("TEMP");
00061     }
00062 };
00063 
00064 //! Keithley 2000 Multimeter
00065 //! You must setup 2000 for SCPI mode
00066 class XKE2000:public XDMMSCPI
00067 {
00068     XNODE_OBJECT
00069 protected:
00070     XKE2000(const char *name, bool runtime,
00071             const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00072             const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00073             const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00074             const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00075         XDMMSCPI(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00076     {
00077         function()->add("VOLT:DC");
00078         function()->add("VOLT:AC");
00079         function()->add("CURR:DC");
00080         function()->add("CURR:AC");
00081         function()->add("RES");
00082         function()->add("FRES");
00083         function()->add("FREQ");
00084         function()->add("TEMP");
00085         function()->add("PER");
00086         function()->add("DIOD");
00087         function()->add("CONT");
00088 
00089         interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(20);
00090     }
00091 };
00092 
00093 //! Agilent(Hewlett-Packard) 34420A nanovolt meter
00094 class XHP34420A:public XDMMSCPI
00095 {
00096     XNODE_OBJECT
00097 protected:
00098     XHP34420A(const char *name, bool runtime,
00099               const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00100               const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00101               const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00102               const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00103         XDMMSCPI(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00104     {
00105         function()->add("VOLT");
00106         function()->add("CURR");
00107         function()->add("RES");
00108         function()->add("FRES");
00109     }
00110 };

00112 //! Agilent(Hewlett-Packard) 3458A DMM.
00113 class XHP3458A : public XCharDeviceDriver<XDMM>
00114 {
00115     XNODE_OBJECT
00116 protected:
00117     XHP3458A(const char *name, bool runtime,
00118              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00119              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00120              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00121              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);

00124

00127     //one-shot reading

00129 protected:

00157 //! SANWA PC500/510/520M DMM.
00158 class XSanwaPC500 : public XCharDeviceDriver<XDMM>
00159 {
00160     XNODE_OBJECT
00161 protected:
00162     XSanwaPC500(const char *name, bool runtime,
00163              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00164              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00165              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00166              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00167 public:
00168     virtual ~XSanwaPC500() {}
00169 
00170     //requests the latest reading
00171     virtual double fetch();
00172     //one-shot reading
00173     virtual double oneShotRead();
00174 protected:
00175     //! called when m_function is changed
00176     virtual void changeFunction();
00177     //! send command.
00178     virtual void requestData();
00179 };
